title: Tesla Sales Surge Just Before US Tax Credit Expires
description: Tesla Inc. reported a surprise surge in US quarterly sales just before federal tax credits were about to expire. The company delivered a record 497,099 vehicles worldwide during the third quarter, up 7.4% from a year ago. The Bloomberg estimate was for about 439,600 in sales. Bloomberg's Ed Ludlow reports. (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Meta Mines Your Chatbot Discussions to Serve More Personal Ads
description: Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin reports on Meta Platforms Inc.’s decision to use conversations with its AI chatbot to help present people with targeted advertisements.

title: Caterpillar Emerges as Unlikely AI Winner on Turbine Demand
description: The hunt for winners in the artificial intelligence gold rush has landed on an unlikely target: old-line industrial equipment maker Caterpillar Inc.
